Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a device that allows two students to communicate over a distance using a string telephone.
The student can show how the string telephone uses sound to carry information.
The student can depict the materials used to make the string telephone device (e.g., cups and string).
The student can draw the string stretched tightly between the cups to demonstrate how sound travels.
The student can illustrate two students using the string telephone, one talking and one listening.
The student can indicate that communicating over a distance is possible with this simple device using sound.
